law.text:
Each producer, refiner, or wholesaler of motor fuel who supplies motor fuel to retail service station dealers:
shall apply all equipment rentals uniformly to all retail service station dealers supplied; and
during periods of shortage:
shall apportion uniformly and equitably all gasoline and special fuel to all retail service station dealers supplied; and
may not discriminate among retail service station dealers supplied in their allotments.
